principles.name: Reasoning 1
principles.description: The response selects the most appropriate reasoning strategy.

principles.name: Reasoning 2
principles.description: Reasoning in the response is structured (e.g. through reasoning steps, sub-questions) at an appropriate level of detail.

principles.name: Reasoning 3
principles.description: Statements in the response are made with appropriate levels of confidence or probability.

principles.name: Reasoning 4
principles.description: Formal reasoning (e.g. using math, computer code) in the response is correct.
